Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.passive

Provides classes defining the components driving the execution of passive actors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CycleActor
    The CycleActor class defines an implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution.
    CycleListActor
    The CycleListActor class provides a partial implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution, maintaining messages into a list and processing all the messages in the mailbox received in the previous execution cycle.
    ListActor
    The ListActor class provides a partial implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution and maintaining messages into a list.
    OldActor
    The OldActor class defines an implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution.
    OneActor
    The OneActor class defines an implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution.
    PassiveActor
    The PassiveActor class provides a partial implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution.
    SavableActor
    The SavableActor class defines an implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution that provides information about its current number of consecutive idle execution cycles.
    SharedActor
    The SharedActor class defines an implementation of an actor using the passive threading solution.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CycleListActor.TimeoutMeasure
    Defines the possible timeout measure units.
